alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 1:26AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Newton and Johnson Counties through 200 AM CST... At 126 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wiederkehr Village, or near Ozark, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... Woodland... Holman... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Coal Hill... Harmony... Lutherville... Ozone... Union City... Hunt... Hillcrest in Johnson County... Mineral Springs Recreation Area... Oak Grove in Johnson County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
